item.title: 정키(Jung Key),거미,시스코(Sisqo) - Without You
item.description:
작곡: 정키 / 작사: 정키, Sisqo
KY: 59929

Bright light
fancy restaurants
Everything
in this world
That a man could
want
That I got a bank
account bigger
Than the law should
allow
Still still lonely now
pretty face
Could have covers
from a Vogue
Still
I want you
But I don’t wanna
be a lonely fool
All of the money
don’t amount
To you
to you
But I can’t pretend
that I don’t see
That I’m incomplete
baby
Without you
without you
Oh baby
oh your sexy lingerie
Girl I remember it
just like
It was on yesterday
baby remember
A Thursday you told me
you had fallen in love
Not sure
that I was
It’s been a year
winter and summer
Spring and fall
I miss you
But I don’t wanna
be a lonely fool
All of the money
don’t amount
To you
to you
But I can’t pretend
that I don’t see
That I’m incomplete
baby
Without you
without you
Pick up
the phone
You don’t have
to pick up the phone
I’ll just leave
a message
Just want
to let you know
I’m right back
here again
Because I need you
call me back
Girl I’m sorry
for loving you
When we broke up
I blamed you at first
Woo
I feel not the same
Baby I can’t live
without you
Oh you stay with me
indeed I want you
I can’t wait
to see you
Can’t live
like I don’t see
That no one can
compare
To you
to you
But I can’t pretend
that I don’t see
That I’m incomplete
baby
Without you
without you
But I don’t wanna
be a lonely fool
All of the money
don’t amount
To you
to you
But I can’t pretend
that I don’t see
That I’m incomplete
baby
Without you
without you
I’m still
loving you
Without you
without you
I’m still
loving you
Without you
without you
Baby
without you
